0000_0000 1111_1000 red
1110_0000 0000_0111 green
0001_1111 0000_0000 blue
0000_0000 0000_0000  

RGB[15..11] 5bit Red
RGB[10..5] 6bit Green
RGB[4..0] 5bit Blue

red
00F8 00C0 0080 0040
0000_0000 1111_1000 4/4
0000_0000 1100_0000 3/4
0000_0000 0100_0000 2/4
0000_0000 0010_0000 1/4

green
E007 2006 E003 0002
1110_0000 0000_0111
0010_0000 0000_0110
1110_0000 0000_0011
0000_0000 0000_0010

0000_0111 1111_0000
0000_0110 0010_0000
0000_0011 1110_0000
0000_0010 0000_0000

00 F8 E0 07 1F 00 00 00
